questions.title: Simple Circuit Analysis
questions.question_text: For a resistor with $R = 100\,\Omega$ and current $I = 2\,\text{A}$, calculate the voltage using Ohm's law $V = IR$.

questions.title: Frequency Calculation
questions.question_text: Given angular frequency $\omega = 628\,\text{rad/s}$, calculate the frequency in Hz using $f = \frac{\omega}{2\pi}$.

questions.title: Phase Relationship
questions.question_text: For two sinusoids with phase difference $\Delta\phi = \pi/2$ radians, one signal leads the other by exactly $90^\circ$.
questions.feedback_correct: Correct! $\pi/2$ radians equals $90^\circ$, indicating a quarter-cycle phase lead.
questions.feedback_incorrect: Remember: $\pi/2\,\text{rad} = 90^\circ$. This represents a quarter-cycle phase difference.

metadata.subject: Electrical Engineering Test
metadata.test_purpose: Compare native vs web app QTI generation
